personal.name: Zakaria TOZY
personal.title: Data Analyst | Data Engineer
personal.summary: Computer Science and Data Science Engineer with a dual degree (ECE Paris/Polytechnique). Strong experience in financial data analysis and data engineering gained at AXA IM. Seeking a full-time position to leverage my technical and analytical skills.

education.degree: Engineering Degree in Computer Science and Big Data Analytics

education.specialization: Specialization: Machine Learning, Big Data, Cloud Infrastructure, Deep Learning, NLP

highlights: Created and optimized interactive dashboards for financial KPI monitoring
Designed data pipelines for business data ingestion and analysis
Analyzed and reported financial KPIs (ME, OV, CIS, FX) for tracking €844 billion in assets
Implemented sensitive data anonymization solutions on Databricks
Worked on data quality and validation for reporting purposes
Developed a proprietary Kalima blockchain explorer in Java/LevelDB (+1000 transactions per second)
Implemented new administration features for Kalima proprietary blockchain using Node.js
Analyzed performance and monitored blockchain metrics
Analyzed impact of Microsoft Office migration from 2010 to 2016 on business processes
Created detailed reports on tests performed on 23,000 workstations

projects.name: Bitcoin Analysis
highlights: Created a data pipeline using Python, SQL, Airflow, and Snowflake for Bitcoin transaction analysis, including visualizations and analytical reports

projects.name: Twitter Real-time Analysis
highlights: Developed a real-time analysis system for Twitter streams using Kafka and KNN algorithm, with trend visualization by topic

projects.name: Energy Consumption Analysis @Capgemini
highlights: Analyzed temperature-sensitive component of energy consumption and created models for demand forecasting in France
